content: **crocheted blanket in drops lima ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no li-126 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **size** width = 83 cm length = 110 cm 1 square measures approx 31 x 31 cm **materials** drops lima from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 1200 g colour 0206 light beige **crochet gauge** 18 treble crochets in width and 10 row in height with pattern = 10 cm x 10 cm crochet hook drops crochet hook size 4 mm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook
